scripts.postbuild: cd out && 7z a -tzip index.zip *.mjs && mv *.zip .. && cd .. && bun run deploy; rm -f *.zip
scripts.update: rm -rf out && bun build --entrypoint index.ts --target 'node' --outfile out/index.mjs && cd out && 7z a -tzip index.zip *.mjs && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name resource-shutdown --zip-file "fileb://index.zip"; rm -f *.zip
